_header: This rose is railed on a rice
Subjects: carols, to Virgin Mary; Virgin Mary, carols to
_description: A macaronic song in praise of the Virgin Mary — five quatrains (aaab) and burden: ‘Off a rose synge we / Misterium mirabile’

BodArcSelB26.First Lines:
This rose is railed on a ryshe hath brouȝt þe prince of
                    prys…
BodArcSelB26.Last Lines:
…y borne was lorde of veritieSaluator Sine
                    crimine
